function_call.name: classify_risks_PESTLE
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Possible faecal-oral transmission of sars-cov-2","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of guidelines for residential buildings’ resilience to covid-19","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Opaque development of pandemic management technologies","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Risk of infection increases with greater exposure to others and higher occupant density in the building.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Threats to data validity due to remote data collection","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Contamination of fomites with sars-cov-2 particles from infected individuals and bodily secretions","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Negative psychological effects on mental health due to the covid-19 pandemic lockdown.","category":"Social risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Faecal-oral transmission","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inadequate ventilation leading to poor indoor air quality and increased risk of disease transmission","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Financial risks in oecd countries due to living costs","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Spread of virus","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Mental and behavioral disorders due to social distancing and home confinement","category":"Social risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Risk of decreased use of public spaces","category":"Social risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of indoor data on humidity and influenza transmission","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Employees hesitant to return to touch-based offices","category":"Social risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Inflexible layout design may lead to inadequate access to daylight and natural light, impacting the overall health and well-being of occupants.","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Poorer housing conditions with higher incidences of overcrowding","category":"Social risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Chemical exposure and health risks from chlorine dioxide","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Download and import of stop words from nltk library","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of sustainable and cost-effective building technologies for improving air quality and reducing disease transmission.","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Use of semi-quantitative indices to assess resilience may lead to oversimplification of complex systems and miss important factors.","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Improper management and disposal of infectious and hazardous medical waste in healthcare facilities and factories.","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Gap in translating science-based evidence and solutions to reduce health risks in the built environment","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Viral rna presence in air samples","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Correlational findings instead of causal findings","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Mixed results on the relationship between moral support for measures and compliant behavior","category":"Social risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of effective risk management in workplace operations","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Increased reliance on non-contact interaction","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inconsistent sterilization temperatures and fluctuation ranges may compromise the effectiveness of high temperature steam disinfection","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Allowing employees to use company resources for personal work and experimentation may lead to unhygienic conditions and increased risk of disease transmission.","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"High peak demand on critical care beds beyond surge capacity","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Non-normative obligation to obey the law in relation to covid-19 regulations","category":"Political risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Inconsistencies in the database, stemming from misunderstandings, invalid responses, or typo errors, may compromise the accuracy of the analysis.","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Running simulations in hypothetical cities to demonstrate the impact of spatial distributions of housing, education, and economic activities on epidemics","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Insufficient ventilation leading to indoor air stagnation and high pathogen concentration.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"High eco2 levels in indoor environment","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Retailers not demonstrating corporate social responsibility through signage","category":"Social risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of standardized testing for intercomparisons of monitoring data","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Consideration of non-contact commercial activities in the future","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Analysis of alteration of daily activities and habits","category":"Social risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Nationalism at the expense of the global good","category":"Political risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Collaboration with outsiders may introduce new contagious diseases to the local community or staff risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Sharing information and interacting closely with competitors may lead to the transmission of contagious diseases if proper precautions are not risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Disproportionately negative impact of the pandemic on immigrants’ labor market outcomes","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Rise in
